author: toydan
body:
I have been trying to get right w the world/universe for some time. Think when I let 3 cars in traffic last night everything aligned.  I put everything I care about in a separate watch list manually everyday. Gives me a chance to look at them as I do it. All green except LCID which is good as that is my lone short. And PTLR a little red. 

I did sell my PYPL shares and got a 1/23 $250 LEAP $66.58

Sold my Z shares and got 2 1/23 $90 LEAP $25.83 each

With some leftover funds, Said fuk it and got SDC 150 sh and 4 1/23 $5 LEAPS @ $2.50 each. 

playing SKLZ. first time in long time I am in on meme and I usually just play them like I am this one w 250 sh and selling a couple 9/10 $15 CCs. 

Forget who it was in here, but I did hop on w them PSFE w 150 sh and sold 2 $8 CSPs. 

Playing LMND for earnings did 5 11/17 80/85 Call debit spreads since I was learning those. 

I posted all plays real time and added these today. Will pick up more NIO somehow. So easy to make money on that one under $40. 

That’s all I got today.

Good luck!

author: MightyManorMan
body:
The point of markets is to always push the top of the index up. If you are waiting for it to go down, you might be waiting a long long long time. 

Look at Paypal, pretty close to value. Company is still growing, maybe 15% a year or so. EPS is up. Sitting on cash.

Look at Apple, pretty close to value. Company still growing, maybe 5% a year or so. EPS is up. Sitting on cash. And buying back their shares if they go too low... bought back about 790 million shares in 2020.

Microsoft, a little over values, growing revenue, growing earnings, sitting on cash. And buying back their shares if they go too low... bought back about 50 million shares in 2020.

There is plenty of value.

author: ReggieStocker25
body: He’s very shady - doesn’t release any PR as the CEO except when he files 4 or 8k Forms. He bought $IPSI shares shortly after their high around .24 and .15. Big takeaway from the last 8k Form was his “Corbett Clause”. This company has so much potential. OTC stocks need P/R in order to survive. No volume almost guarantees the stock will regress negatively. That’s been the case since April. $IPSI has invested in a P/R according to one of their early 4-K Form so hopefully that comes into fruition. He put his daughter on IPSI chair board as a high ranking member. The kiosks deployment has been delayed but the blame is due mostly to covid. One thing I can see Corbett did well is eliminate all the toxic debt. I’m just worried he runs this stock up and dips. $IPSI has the potential to be the next PayPal and having William Corbett at the helm has raised more questions than answers in the shareholders eyes. Not to mention spelling mistakes on the website. This company is very early which is a good thing, they just need to clean up their errors
